content.raw: So, I was actually able to write tests and get them running on both Unix and Windows.  I'm doing a test build on the build farm right now.  I got 90% coverage in Filesystem.cc on Linux; there are 2 lines that would be hard to get to without some hackery.  Hopefully this is a good improvement!
